Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword.helpers

Class JSwordStrongNumberHelper

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword.helpers.JSwordStrongNumberHelper
public class JSwordStrongNumberHelper extends Object
Provides each strong number given a verse.

Note, this object is not thread-safe. The intention is for it to be a use-once, throw-away type of object.
